verses: me, O God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation: O deliver me from the
the God of my strength: why dost thou cast me off? why go I
because of the oppression of the enemy?
and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy
Then will I go unto the altar of God, unto God my exceeding joy: yea, upon the harp will I praise thee, O God my God.
Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope in God: for I shall yet praise him,
the health of my countenance, and my God.
